title: Sound All Around
description: Readers learn about sound waves and vibration, volume, and pitch. The book delves into the many forms of sound and describes how the human ear and brain work together to receive and perceive sound. Photos and captions support the text.
meta: communicate, pitch, pleasant, pluck, sensitive, sound waves, vibrates, vocal cords, volume
Use the reading strategy of visualizing to understand text
Cause and Effect : Understand and identify cause-and-effect relationships
Commas : Identify and use commas in a series
Compound Words : Recognize and form compound words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
